title: Affordable  rent beautiful 2+2 near to the BLVD ,Prime Sherman Oaks,!!
posting_body: Awesome two bedroom and two bathroom ,low rent , high quality ,nice and quiet neighborhood ,prime Sherman Oaks, half block from the BLVD,first floor,new paint,tile and laminate wood flooring,central A/C,fire place,heat, SS double kitchen sink, gas stove,microwave,refrigerator garbage disposal dishwasher.
private balcony,subterranean parkings and much more.
